name: Bhindi.io Replit Bridge
description: Connect your Replit workspace to Bhindi.io for AI-powered development
longDescription: This extension enables seamless integration between your Replit workspace and Bhindi.io's AI platform. It allows Bhindi to read files, execute commands, manage projects, and deploy your code directly within Replit.

scopes.name: read
scopes.reason: Read project files and structure to provide context to Bhindi AI

scopes.name: write-exec
scopes.reason: Create, modify files and execute deployment commands via Bhindi AI

scopes.name: repldb:read
scopes.reason: Store and retrieve Bhindi integration settings

scopes.name: repldb:write
scopes.reason: Save user preferences and configuration data
